title: The True Beauty of Being Bitten by a Tick

sources.title: The True Beauty (TOUCHING FILM in German, German films, drama full film, family drama)

metadata.Plot: A woman visits her friend's countryside home, joining a small group for what promises to be a cozy weekend of food and games. A tick bite leads to unsettling developments that transform their idyllic retreat into something sinister.
metadata.Writer: Zoë Chao, James Cusati-Moyer, Jeremy O. Harris
metadata.Actors: Zoë Chao, Callie Hernandez, James Cusati-Moyer
